dct_description_sm: This point data layer represents adult day cares for Wisconsin in 2019. The dataset was originally published by the Wisconsin Department of Health Services on September 11. 2019.[This dataset contains locations and attributes of adult day cares licensed by the state of Wisconsin. The data is used for planning, management and analysis by Wisconsin Department of Health Services staff and by other government agencies.For more information please visit the Wisconsin Department of Health Services website: https://www.dhs.wisconsin.gov/regulations/adultdaycare/introduction.htm][ADULT DAY CARE: A day program that provides the elderly and other adults with services when their caregivers are at work or need relief. Only those adult day care programs seeking to serve one or more participants with waiver funding are required to be certified.]
